Virtusa #Hiring! We are looking for a PostgreSQL Database Administrator with good hands-on experience in RDBMS such as Sybase, Oracle and MS SQL server in Berkeley Heights, NJ. This is a Weekly 5 Days Work from Office role and no REMOTE option available. Kindly reach me out for more details. #postgresql #dba #databaseadministrator #databases #njjobs #openfornewopportunities #openjobs
